docs.abstract: Lai Xiaomin, a former Communist Party secretary and ex-head of Huarong Asset Management, is the latest executive caught up in China’s vast anti-corruption drive.
docs.snippet: Lai Xiaomin, a former Communist Party secretary and ex-head of Huarong Asset Management, is the latest executive caught up in China’s vast anti-corruption drive.
docs.lead_paragraph: China’s sweeping anti-corruption campaign has claimed another target: the head of a powerful state lender.

headline.main: Head of Powerful Chinese Lender Is Swept Up in Corruption Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Ex-Chief of Chinese Lender Swept Up in Crackdown

docs.abstract: Google’s new machine-learning tools for its mail service can save you time and typos — as long as you are comfortable sharing your thoughts with the software.
docs.snippet: Google’s new machine-learning tools for its mail service can save you time and typos — as long as you are comfortable sharing your thoughts with the software.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. The new Gmail feature that lets the software write your mail messages for you sounds intriguing, if not unsettling. How does it work, and has the feature rolled out to regular users so I can see it for myself?

docs.abstract: The social media companies, under fire for allowing misinformation, unveiled new tools meant to improve transparency before the midterm elections.
docs.snippet: The social media companies, under fire for allowing misinformation, unveiled new tools meant to improve transparency before the midterm elections.
docs.lead_paragraph: MENLO PARK, Calif. — Social media companies, stepping up efforts to stop disinformation on their online platforms ahead of this year’s midterm elections, unveiled on Thursday new tools aimed at improving transparency around advertisements.

headline.main: Facebook and Twitter Expand Peek Into Who’s Behind Their Ads
headline.print_headline: Facebook and Twitter Unveil New Systems To Verify Advertisers

docs.abstract: When just one tweet isn’t enough, you can use Twitter’s threading tool to write and publish a series of connected posts on a topic.
docs.snippet: When just one tweet isn’t enough, you can use Twitter’s threading tool to write and publish a series of connected posts on a topic.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. On Twitter for Android, how do you make one of those multiple-part tweets? Do you have to write them as you go?

headline.print_headline: Creating and Sharing A Twitter Thread

docs.abstract: Google saves your settings and some app content to its cloud, but third-party programs may give you a more complete backup.
docs.snippet: Google saves your settings and some app content to its cloud, but third-party programs may give you a more complete backup.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. How do you automatically back up an Android device without a computer, and where do the files live?

headline.main: How to Back Up Your Android Phone
headline.print_headline: How to Back Up Your Android

docs.abstract: Apple includes plenty of security features to protect your data, but if you forget your passcode and can’t unlock the phone, you can still regain control.
docs.snippet: Apple includes plenty of security features to protect your data, but if you forget your passcode and can’t unlock the phone, you can still regain control.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. What do you do if you forget your iPhone passcode and get a message on the lock screen saying the phone is disabled? What is disabling it?

headline.main: Locked Out of Your iPhone? Here’s What to Do

docs.abstract: The Bookmarks Library window gives you a tidy place to sort, file, rearrange and otherwise manage the shortcuts to your favorite places on the web.
docs.snippet: The Bookmarks Library window gives you a tidy place to sort, file, rearrange and otherwise manage the shortcuts to your favorite places on the web.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. When I first started using Firefox on my computer, I put a bunch of bookmarks into bookmark folders in the program, but I can never find them. How do I move some of these on the Bookmarks tool bar?

docs.abstract: One of the few women to own an agency in the 1970s, she built a client roster that included Grace Paley and Andrea Dworkin as well as Salman Rushdie and Abbie Hoffman.
docs.snippet: One of the few women to own an agency in the 1970s, she built a client roster that included Grace Paley and Andrea Dworkin as well as Salman Rushdie and Abbie Hoffman.
docs.lead_paragraph: Elaine Markson, who was among the first women to own a literary agency and to further the careers of fledgling feminist authors, died on May 21 at her home in Manhattan. She was 87.

headline.main: Elaine Markson, Literary Agent for Feminist Authors, Dies at 87
headline.print_headline: Elaine Markson, 87, Agent to Authors Of Radical and Feminist Persuasions

docs.abstract: For a minimum investment of $10,000, people in the United States will be able to open and manage their own start-ups to deliver Amazon packages.
docs.snippet: For a minimum investment of $10,000, people in the United States will be able to open and manage their own start-ups to deliver Amazon packages.
docs.lead_paragraph: SEATTLE — Amazon has more than 100 warehouses. It has a fleet of trucks, and even its own airplanes. Now, in another effort to help get its millions of packages to shoppers faster, it wants to build an army of delivery people, too.

headline.main: Amazon Has a Business Proposition for You: Deliver Its Packages
headline.print_headline: Amazon Plans to Push Start-Ups To Help Deliver Its Own Packages

docs.abstract: A decision by Britain’s culture secretary sets up a new phase in a battle between two media giants, as the industry rushes to consolidate.
docs.snippet: A decision by Britain’s culture secretary sets up a new phase in a battle between two media giants, as the industry rushes to consolidate.
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON — Comcast wants to upend the Walt Disney Company’s empire-building plans, and a jewel of Europe’s media industry could give it an opening.

headline.main: U.K. Clears Way for Bidding War Between Comcast and Disney Over Sky
headline.print_headline: U.K. Ruling Clears Way For Battle Over Sky

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
